summary: An innocent woman, accused of murdering her son and hanged as a witch, curses a tree and the children who play around it. The effects of this act of revenge echo through the years and ... See full summary Â»
cast: Sarah Rose Denton|Lucy Clarvis|Lawrence Weller|Charlie Bond|Viv Bonney|Caroline Boulton|Danielle Bux|Rob Byrne|Jon Campling|Frankie James Danton|Oliver Ebsworth|Jayne Friend|Lorraine Gray|Adam Greaves-Neal|Ben Greaves-Neal|Joshua Greaves-Neal|Shane Green|Alexandra Lawes|Dean Maskell|Katie Mckay|Elliott Odom|Jemima Odom|Harvey Pearmain|Liam Ponder|Alex Reece|Harvey Remblance|James Sibley|Daniel Smith|Sue Plunkett Thomas|Lydia Thorpe
title: Curse of the Witching Tree
